// src/components/Common/Navbar.jsx
import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link,useNavigate,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const location=useLocation();const[mobileMenuOpen,setMobileMenuOpen]=useState(false);const user=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user')||'{}');const handleLogout=()=>{localStorage.removeItem('token');localStorage.removeItem('user');alert("are you sure you want to logout");navigate('/login');};const navLinks=[{path:'/',label:'Dashboard',icon:'üìä'},{path:'/reports',label:'Reports',icon:'üìÑ'},{path:'/vitals',label:'Vitals',icon:'‚ù§Ô∏è'},{path:'/shared-with-me',label:'Shared',icon:'üë•'}];const isActive=path=>{return location.pathname===path?'active':'';};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navbar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"navbar-brand",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uD83C\uDFE5 Health Wallet"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"mobile-menu-btn",onClick:()=>setMobileMenuOpen(!mobileMenuOpen),children:"\u2630"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar-menu ".concat(mobileMenuOpen?'open':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"navbar-links",children:navLinks.map(link=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:link.path,className:"nav-link ".concat(isActive(link.path)),onClick:()=>setMobileMenuOpen(false),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"nav-icon",children:link.icon}),link.label]},link.path))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar-user",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"user-name",children:user.username}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"user-email",children:user.email})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn-logout",onClick:handleLogout,children:"Logout"})]})]})]})});};export default Navbar;
